page.title: 10 New Developments
page.content: The Ladygate shopping centre was completed two years ago and consists of small shops including,a green- grocers,a sweet shop,a bakers and a shoe menders.The ladygate leads out to Gateway,a super-market(formally Key Markets).Kansels a drug store was also built at that time.So was Shoe-save.An Oxfam shop opened at the beginning of 1985.The Broadway arcade was completed in the month of Febuary 1985.This consists of a large number of shops which each vary in size and style. Just next door to this arcade there is a new chip shop which opened a month after the arcade.In June 1985 a new hairdressers opened called Heads Together it is opposite the Ladygate centre,next to Rowlands sweetshop,in Wickford high street.Halifax Building society is now being built next to Garbetts Chemist
